content: स्तंबः [स्था-अबच् किच्च पृषो° <ls>Uṇ. 4. 96</ls>] {@--1@} A clump of grass &c.; <ls>R. 5. 15.</ls> {@--2@} A sheaf of corn; as in स्तंबकरिता <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--3@} A cluster, clump or bunch (in general); <ls>U. 2. 29</ls>, <ls>R. 15. 19.</ls> {@--4@} A bush, thicket. {@--5@} A shrub or plant having no decided stem. {@--6@} The post to which an elephant is tied. {@--7@} A post. {@--8@} Stupefaction, insensibility; (probably for स्तंभ in these two senses). {@--9@} A mountain.
